name: Pumpkin Crisp w/ Walnut Topping
author: Paula Dean

ingredients.name: garnish: sweetened whipped cream, ground cinnamon

instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350Â°. Lightly grease an 8-inch square baking dish
2. Ina large bowl, whisk together pumpkin, sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, and vanilla until smooth. Pour into prepared baking dish; sprinkle evenly with Walnut Crisp Topping (Recipe #897). Bake for 45 to 50 minutes, or until center is set and topping is golden brown. Serve warm with whipped cream and cinnaman, if desired
